project.android.imageprocessing.input
Class GLTextureOutputRenderer

java.lang.Object
  project.android.imageprocessing.GLRenderer
      project.android.imageprocessing.input.GLTextureOutputRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicFilter, CameraPreviewInput, VideoResourceInput
public abstract class GLTextureOutputRenderer
extends GLRenderer

A output producing extension of GLRenderer. This class produces its output in the form of a texture and then sends that texture to all of the filters or endpoints that have been added as targets to this renderer.

Author:
Chris Batt

Constructor Summary
GLTextureOutputRenderer()
          Creates a GLTextureOutputRenderer which initially has an empty list of targets.

Method Detail

onDrawFrame

public void onDrawFrame()
Description copied from class: GLRenderer
Draws the given texture using OpenGL and the given vertex and fragment shaders. Calling of this method is handled by the FastImageProcessingPipeline and should not be called manually.

Overrides:
onDrawFrame in class GLRenderer

onSurfaceCreated

public void onSurfaceCreated()
Description copied from class: GLRenderer
Sets up the OpenGL context for the given renderer. Compiles the program along with the vertex and fragment shaders. Calling of this method is handled by the FastImageProcessingPipeline and should not be called manually.

Overrides:
onSurfaceCreated in class GLRenderer

setRenderSize

public void setRenderSize(int width,
                          int height)
Description copied from class: GLRenderer
Sets the render size of the renderer to the given width and height. This also prevents the size of the renderer from changing automatically when one of the source(s) of the renderer has a size change.

Overrides:
setRenderSize in class GLRenderer
Parameters:
width - The width at which the renderer should draw at.
height - The height at which the renderer should draw at.
